price: 97. Waxaana ognahay inay ka cidhiidhyoonto laabtaadu waxay sheegi.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ نَعۡلَمُ أَنَّكَ يَضِيقُ صَدۡرُكَ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad naʿlamu annaka yaḍīqu ṣadruka bimā yaqūlūna
